languages.text: Когда на счету каждый профессионал, так ли важно, как именно были получены эти навыки? Вольный Торговец не гнушается людей с темным прошлым, чем заслуживает уважение разношерстной команды Равора.

traits.locale_text: Когда на счету каждый профессионал, так ли важно, как именно были получены эти навыки? Вольный Торговец не гнушается людей с темным прошлым, чем заслуживает уважение разношерстной команды Равора.

languages.text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.
languages.original_text: Когда на счету каждый профессионал, так ли важно, как именно были получены эти навыки? Вольный Торговец не гнушается людей с темным прошлым, чем заслуживает уважение разношерстной команды Равора.

traits.locale_text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with a murky past, which has earned {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with a murky past, which has earned {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

languages.text: 每个行业的专业人士都非常重要，至于这些人的专业技能是怎么培养出来的，这真的很重要吗？行商浪人从不区别对待那些出身不光彩的人，也因此赢得了雷沃手下全体船员的尊重。
languages.original_text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

traits.locale_text: 每个行业的专业人士都非常重要，至于这些人的专业技能是怎么培养出来的，这真的很重要吗？行商浪人从不区别对待那些出身不光彩的人，也因此赢得了雷沃手下全体船员的尊重。

languages.text: それぞれの専門家が必要とされる時、彼らがどのようにしてその技術を身につけたかは問題になるだろうか？ローグトレーダーは過去が曖昧な人々を避けたりはしない。だからこそラヴォアの寄せ集めのクルーから尊敬されている。
languages.original_text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

traits.locale_text: それぞれの専門家が必要とされる時、彼らがどのようにしてその技術を身につけたかは問題になるだろうか？ローグトレーダーは過去が曖昧な人々を避けたりはしない。だからこそラヴォアの寄せ集めのクルーから尊敬されている。

languages.text: Wenn jeder Profi zählt, spielt es dann eine Route, woher ihre Fähigkeiten kommen? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} lehnt Personen mit zweifelhafter Vergangenheit nicht ab, was {mf|ihm|ihr} den Respekt von Ravors zusammengewürfelter Crew eingebracht hat.
languages.original_text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

traits.locale_text: Wenn jeder Profi zählt, spielt es dann eine Route, woher ihre Fähigkeiten kommen? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} lehnt Personen mit zweifelhafter Vergangenheit nicht ab, was {mf|ihm|ihr} den Respekt von Ravors zusammengewürfelter Crew eingebracht hat.

languages.text: Her bir profesyonelin önem arz ettiği bir durumda, yeteneklerini nasıl edindikleri neyi değiştirir? Hür Tacir, karanlık geçmişi olanları hor görüp dışlamıyor. Bu da ona Ravor'un toplama tayfasının saygısını kazandırıyor.
languages.original_text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

traits.locale_text: Her bir profesyonelin önem arz ettiği bir durumda, yeteneklerini nasıl edindikleri neyi değiştirir? Hür Tacir, karanlık geçmişi olanları hor görüp dışlamıyor. Bu da ona Ravor'un toplama tayfasının saygısını kazandırıyor.

languages.text: Cuando todos los profesionales cuentan, ¿importa realmente de dónde han sacado sus habilidades? {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no rechaza a la gente por su pasado, lo que le ha granjeado el respeto de la tripulación variopinta de Ravor.
languages.original_text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

traits.locale_text: Cuando todos los profesionales cuentan, ¿importa realmente de dónde han sacado sus habilidades? {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no rechaza a la gente por su pasado, lo que le ha granjeado el respeto de la tripulación variopinta de Ravor.

languages.text: Si chaque professionnel compte, faut-il vraiment s'arrêter à la façon dont ils ont acquis leurs compétences ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ne rejette pas les individus au passé douteux, ce qui lui vaut le respect de la bande hétéroclite de Ravor.
languages.original_text: When every professional counts, does it matter how exactly they obtained their skills? The Rogue Trader does not shun people with murky pasts, thus earning {mf|him|her} the respect of Ravor's motley crew.

traits.locale_text: Si chaque professionnel compte, faut-il vraiment s'arrêter à la façon dont ils ont acquis leurs compétences ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ne rejette pas les individus au passé douteux, ce qui lui vaut le respect de la bande hétéroclite de Ravor.
